attributes.action: To block the 2nd Scottish referendum and stop Scotland leaving the UK
attributes.background: Scotland should not leave the UK as it needs us to survive and should stand tall and proud with its nation and not to divorce us. If they leave it will cripple their markets and cause a divide between people. Especially the ones that live in one country and work in the other.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134361
